---
File: /apps/cdn/config.ts
---

import type { IConfig } from '@duxweb/dvha-core'
import { i18nProvider, simpleAuthProvider, simpleDataProvider } from '@duxweb/dvha-core'
import * as DuxNaiveUI from '@duxweb/dvha-naiveui'
import { enUS, zhCN } from '@duxweb/dvha-pro'
import * as DuxPro from '@duxweb/dvha-pro'
import * as NaiveUI from 'naive-ui'

declare global {
  interface Window {
    duxConfig?: {
      defaultManage?: string
      theme?: {
        logo?: string
        darkLogo?: string
        banner?: string
        darkBanner?: string
      }
      copyright?: string
      manage?: Array<{
        name?: string
        title?: string
        description?: string
        routePrefix?: string
        apiBasePath?: string
        apiRoutePath?: string
        userMenus?: Array<{
          key?: string
          label?: string
          icon?: string
          path?: string
        }>
      }>
    }
  }
}

const config = {
  theme: {},
  manages: [
  ],
  dataProvider: simpleDataProvider({
    apiUrl: '',
  }),
  authProvider: simpleAuthProvider(),
  i18nProvider: i18nProvider({
    locale: 'zh-CN',
    fallbackLocale: 'en-US',
    messages: {
      'zh-CN': zhCN,
      'en-US': enUS,
    },
  }),
  remote: {
    packages: {
      'naive-ui': NaiveUI,
      '@duxweb/dvha-pro': DuxPro,
      '@duxweb/dvha-naiveui': DuxNaiveUI,
    },
  },
  jsonSchema: {
    components: [
      ...Object.values(DuxPro).filter(comp => comp?.name?.startsWith?.('Dux')),
      ...Object.values(DuxNaiveUI).filter(comp => comp?.name?.startsWith?.('Dux')),
      ...Object.entries(NaiveUI)
        .filter(([key, _comp]) => {
          return key.startsWith?.('N')
        })
        .map((comp) => {
          const component = comp[1] as any
          component.name = comp[0]
          return component
        }),
    ],
  },

}

function injectConfig(config: IConfig): IConfig {
  if (typeof window == 'undefined' || !window.duxConfig) {
    throw new Error('config not found')
  }

  const serverConfig = window.duxConfig

  config.defaultManage = serverConfig.defaultManage || config.defaultManage

  if (serverConfig.theme) {
    config.theme = {
      ...config.theme,
      ...serverConfig.theme,
    }
  }

  config.copyright = serverConfig.copyright || config.copyright

  serverConfig?.manage?.forEach((serverManage) => {
    config.manages.push({
      ...serverManage,
      components: {
        authLayout: DuxPro.DuxAuthLayout,
        noAuthLayout: DuxPro.DuxLayout,
        notFound: DuxPro.DuxPage404,
        loading: DuxPro.DuxPageLoading,
        error: DuxPro.DuxPage500,
      },
      routes: [
        {
          name: `${serverManage.name}.login`,
          path: 'login',
          component: DuxPro.DuxLoginPage,
          meta: {
            authorization: false,
          },
        },
      ],
    } as any)
  })

  return config as IConfig
}

export default injectConfig(config)

File: /apps/cdn/main.ts
---

import { createDux } from '@duxweb/dvha-core'
import * as DuxPro from '@duxweb/dvha-pro'
import * as NaiveUI from 'naive-ui'
import { createApp } from 'vue'
import config from './config'

// import '@duxweb/dvha-pro/style.css'

import '@duxweb/dvha-pro/theme/style.scss'

const { createDuxPro, DuxApp } = DuxPro

const app = createApp(DuxApp)

app.use(createDux(config))
app.use(NaiveUI)
app.use(createDuxPro())

app.mount('#app')

# Dux Template - åŸºç¡€ç®¡ç†ç³»ç»Ÿæ¨¡æ¿

è¿™æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªåŸºäº `@duxweb/dvha-core` æ¡†æ¶æ„å»ºçš„åŸºç¡€ç®¡ç†ç³»ç»Ÿæ¨¡æ¿ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨ Vue 3 + UnoCSS æä¾›ç®€æ´ç°ä»£çš„ç•Œé¢è®¾è®¡ã€‚

## âœ¨ ç‰¹æ€§

- ğŸ¨ **çº¯ UnoCSS** - åŸå­åŒ– CSS æ¡†æ¶ï¼Œæ— é¢å¤– UI åº“ä¾èµ–
- ğŸš€ **Vue 3** - åŸºäºæœ€æ–°çš„ Vue 3 Composition API
- ğŸ“± **å“åº”å¼è®¾è®¡** - å®Œç¾é€‚é…æ¡Œé¢ç«¯å’Œç§»åŠ¨ç«¯
- ğŸ”§ **@duxweb/dvha-core** - é›†æˆ Dux æ¡†æ¶çš„å®Œæ•´åŠŸèƒ½
- ğŸ¯ **å¼€ç®±å³ç”¨** - åŒ…å«å¸¸ç”¨é¡µé¢å’Œç»„ä»¶
- ğŸ”’ **æƒé™ç®¡ç†** - å†…ç½®ç™»å½•å’Œæƒé™æ§åˆ¶
- ğŸ“¦ **æ¨¡å—åŒ–** - æ˜“äºæ‰©å±•å’Œå®šåˆ¶

## ğŸ“ é¡¹ç›®ç»“æ„

```
packages/template/
â”œâ”€â”€ pages/           # é¡µé¢ç»„ä»¶
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ layout.vue   # ä¸»å¸ƒå±€ï¼ˆä¾§è¾¹æ +å¤´éƒ¨ï¼‰
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ home.vue     # é¦–é¡µ
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ login.vue    # ç™»å½•é¡µ
â”‚   â””â”€â”€ 404.vue      # 404é”™è¯¯é¡µ
â”œâ”€â”€ main.ts          # åº”ç”¨å…¥å£
â”œâ”€â”€ App.vue          # æ ¹ç»„ä»¶
â”œâ”€â”€ uno.config.ts    # UnoCSS é…ç½®
â””â”€â”€ package.json     # ä¾èµ–é…ç½®
```

## ğŸš€ å¿«é€Ÿå¼€å§‹

### 1. å®‰è£…ä¾èµ–

```bash
npm install
```

### 2. å¯åŠ¨å¼€å‘æœåŠ¡å™¨

```bash
npm run dev
```

### 3. æ„å»ºç”Ÿäº§ç‰ˆæœ¬

```bash
npm run build
```

## ğŸ“„ é¡µé¢è¯´æ˜

### ğŸ  é¦–é¡µ (home.vue)
- ç³»ç»Ÿæ¦‚è§ˆå’Œç»Ÿè®¡æ•°æ®
- å¿«é€Ÿæ“ä½œå…¥å£
- æœ€è¿‘æ´»åŠ¨è®°å½•
- ç³»ç»ŸçŠ¶æ€ç›‘æ§

### ğŸ” ç™»å½•é¡µ (login.vue)
- ç”¨æˆ·èº«ä»½éªŒè¯
- è¡¨å•éªŒè¯å’Œé”™è¯¯æç¤º
- è®°ä½ç™»å½•çŠ¶æ€
- ç¬¬ä¸‰æ–¹ç™»å½•æ”¯æŒ

### ğŸ¯ å¸ƒå±€ (layout.vue)
- å›ºå®šå¤´éƒ¨å¯¼èˆª
- å¯æŠ˜å ä¾§è¾¹æ 
- ç§»åŠ¨ç«¯é€‚é…
- ç”¨æˆ·èœå•å’Œé€šçŸ¥

### âŒ 404é¡µé¢ (404.vue)
- å‹å¥½çš„é”™è¯¯æç¤º
- æœç´¢åŠŸèƒ½
- å¿«é€Ÿå¯¼èˆªé“¾æ¥

## ğŸ¨ æ ·å¼ç³»ç»Ÿ

æœ¬æ¨¡æ¿ä½¿ç”¨ UnoCSS åŸå­åŒ– CSS æ¡†æ¶ï¼Œä¸»è¦åŒ…å«ï¼š

- **é¢œè‰²ç³»ç»Ÿ**: åŸºäº Tailwind çš„é¢œè‰²è°ƒè‰²æ¿
- **å›¾æ ‡åº“**: Tabler Icons (@iconify-json/tabler)
- **å“åº”å¼**: ç§»åŠ¨ä¼˜å…ˆçš„å“åº”å¼è®¾è®¡
- **åŠ¨ç”»**: å¹³æ»‘çš„è¿‡æ¸¡å’Œäº¤äº’æ•ˆæœ


## ğŸ”§ é…ç½®è¯´æ˜

### Dux é…ç½® (main.ts)

```typescript
const config: IConfig = {
  apiUrl: 'your-api-url',
  defaultManage: 'admin',
  manages: [
    {
      name: 'admin',
      title: 'ç®¡ç†ç³»ç»Ÿæ ‡é¢˜',
      routePrefix: '/admin',
      components: {
        authLayout: () => import('./pages/layout.vue'),
        notFound: () => import('./pages/404.vue'),
      },
      menus: [
        // èœå•é…ç½®
      ]
    }
  ],
  simpleDataProvider,
  simpleAuthProvider,
}
```

### UnoCSS é…ç½® (uno.config.ts)

```typescript
export default defineConfig({
  presets: [
    presetWind3(),        // Tailwind CSS å…¼å®¹
    presetIcons({         // å›¾æ ‡æ”¯æŒ
      collections: {
        tabler: () => import('@iconify-json/tabler/icons.json')
      }
    })
  ]
})
```

## ğŸ›  è‡ªå®šä¹‰å’Œæ‰©å±•

### æ·»åŠ æ–°é¡µé¢

1. åœ¨ `pages/` ç›®å½•åˆ›å»ºæ–°çš„ Vue ç»„ä»¶
2. åœ¨ `main.ts` ä¸­æ·»åŠ è·¯ç”±é…ç½®
3. åœ¨èœå•é…ç½®ä¸­æ·»åŠ å¯¼èˆªé¡¹

```typescript
// æ·»åŠ æ–°èœå•é¡¹
menus: [
  {
    name: 'new-page',
    path: 'new-page',
    icon: 'i-tabler:page',
    label: 'æ–°é¡µé¢',
    component: () => import('./pages/new-page.vue'),
  }
]
```

      '@duxweb/dvha-elementui': resolve(__dirname, '../../packages/elementui/src'),

    },

      origin: '*',
    },

    outDir: 'dist',

    width: 80,

    key: 'nickname',

                <div v-if="downloadLoading || downloadProgress.percent > 0" class="space-y-2">
                  <div class="flex justify-between text-sm">
                    <span>ä¸‹è½½è¿›åº¦</span>
                    <span>{{ downloadProgress.percent?.toFixed(1) }}%</span>

                  </div>

<script setup lang="ts">
import { DuxCard, DuxFormItem, DuxFormLayout, DuxPageForm } from '@duxweb/dvha-pro'
import {
  NAutoComplete,
  NButton,
  NCascader,
  NCheckbox,
  NCheckboxGroup,
  NColorPicker,
  NDatePicker,
  NDynamicInput,
  NDynamicTags,
  NInput,
  NInputNumber,
  NMention,
  NRadio,
  NRadioGroup,
  NRate,
  NSelect,
  NSlider,
  NSwitch,
  NTimePicker,
  NTransfer,
  NTreeSelect,
  NUpload,
  NUploadDragger,
} from 'naive-ui'
import { ref } from 'vue'

// Props å®šä¹‰
const props = defineProps<{
  id?: string | number
}>()

// è¡¨å•æ•°æ®æ¨¡å‹
const model = ref({
  // åŸºç¡€è¾“å…¥
  input: 'ç¤ºä¾‹æ–‡æœ¬',
  inputPassword: '',
  inputNumber: 100,
  textarea: 'è¿™æ˜¯å¤šè¡Œæ–‡æœ¬è¾“å…¥æ¡†çš„ç¤ºä¾‹å†…å®¹\næ”¯æŒæ¢è¡Œæ˜¾ç¤º',

  // é€‰æ‹©å™¨
  select: 'option1',
  multiSelect: ['option1', 'option2'],
  autoComplete: '',
  cascader: null,
  treeSelect: null,

  // é€‰æ‹©æ§ä»¶
  radio: 'option1',
  checkbox: true,
  checkboxGroup: ['option1', 'option3'],
  switch: true,

  // æ—¥æœŸæ—¶é—´
  date: null,
  dateRange: null,
  datetime: null,
  time: null,
  timeRange: null,

  // æ•°å€¼æ§ä»¶
  slider: 50,
  sliderRange: [20, 80],
  rate: 4,
  color: '#18a058',

  // æ–‡ä»¶ä¸Šä¼ 
  fileList: [],

  // ç©¿æ¢­æ¡†
  transfer: ['option1'],

  // åŠ¨æ€æ§ä»¶
  dynamicInput: ['é¡¹ç›®ä¸€', 'é¡¹ç›®äºŒ'],
  dynamicTags: ['æ ‡ç­¾ä¸€', 'æ ‡ç­¾äºŒ', 'æ ‡ç­¾ä¸‰'],

  // æåŠ
  mention: '@å¼ ä¸‰ ä½ å¥½',
})

const selectOptions = [
  { label: 'é€‰é¡¹ä¸€', value: 'option1' },
  { label: 'é€‰é¡¹äºŒ', value: 'option2' },
  { label: 'é€‰é¡¹ä¸‰', value: 'option3' },
  { label: 'é€‰é¡¹å››', value: 'option4' },
]

const radioOptions = [
  { label: 'å•é€‰ä¸€', value: 'option1' },
  { label: 'å•é€‰äºŒ', value: 'option2' },
  { label: 'å•é€‰ä¸‰', value: 'option3' },
]

const checkboxOptions = [
  { label: 'å¤é€‰ä¸€', value: 'option1' },
  { label: 'å¤é€‰äºŒ', value: 'option2' },
]

const cascaderOptions = [
  {
    label: 'å››å·çœ',
    value: 'sichuan',
    children: [
      {
        label: 'æˆéƒ½å¸‚',
        value: 'chengdu',
        children: [
          { label: 'é’ç¾ŠåŒº', value: 'qingyang' },
          { label: 'é”¦æ±ŸåŒº', value: 'jinjiang' },
        ],
      },
    ],
  },
]

const treeSelectOptions = [
  {
    label: 'æŠ€æœ¯éƒ¨é—¨',
    key: 'tech',
    children: [
      { label: 'å‰ç«¯ç»„', key: 'frontend' },
      { label: 'åç«¯ç»„', key: 'backend' },
    ],
  },
]

const transferOptions = [
  { label: 'é€‰é¡¹ä¸€', value: 'option1' },
  { label: 'é€‰é¡¹äºŒ', value: 'option2' },
  { label: 'é€‰é¡¹ä¸‰', value: 'option3' },
]

const autoCompleteOptions = [
  'å¼ ä¸‰',
  'æå››',
  'ç‹äº”',
]

const mentionOptions = [
  { label: 'å¼ ä¸‰', value: 'å¼ ä¸‰' },
  { label: 'æå››', value: 'æå››' },
]

function handleUpload({ fileList }) {
  model.value.fileList = fileList
  return false
}
</script>

<template>

              </NUpload>
            </DuxFormItem>

            <DuxFormItem label="æ‹–æ‹½ä¸Šä¼ " path="fileList">
              <NUpload
                v-model:file-list="model.fileList"
                multiple
                directory-dnd
                @change="handleUpload"
              >
                <NUploadDragger />
              </NUpload>
            </DuxFormItem>
          </DuxFormLayout>
        </div>
      </DuxCard>

      <!-- åŠ¨æ€æ§ä»¶ -->
      <DuxCard
        title="åŠ¨æ€æ§ä»¶"
        description="åŠ¨æ€è¾“å…¥ã€åŠ¨æ€æ ‡ç­¾ã€æåŠç­‰é«˜çº§æ§ä»¶"
        header-bordered
      >
        <div class="container mx-auto max-w-2xl">
          <DuxFormLayout label-placement="left">
            <DuxFormItem label="åŠ¨æ€è¾“å…¥" path="dynamicInput">
              <NDynamicInput
                v-model:value="model.dynamicInput"
                placeholder="ç‚¹å‡»æ·»åŠ é¡¹ç›®"
              />
            </DuxFormItem>

            <DuxFormItem label="åŠ¨æ€æ ‡ç­¾" path="dynamicTags">
              <NDynamicTags
                v-model:value="model.dynamicTags"
                :max="10"
              />
            </DuxFormItem>

            <DuxFormItem label="æåŠåŠŸèƒ½" path="mention">
              <NMention
                v-model:value="model.mention"
                :options="mentionOptions"
                type="textarea"
                :rows="3"
                placeholder="è¾“å…¥ @ å¯ä»¥æåŠç”¨æˆ·"
              />
            </DuxFormItem>
          </DuxFormLayout>
        </div>
      </DuxCard>

      <!-- è¡¨å•æ•°æ®é¢„è§ˆ -->
      <DuxCard
        title="è¡¨å•æ•°æ®é¢„è§ˆ"
        description="å®æ—¶æ˜¾ç¤ºå½“å‰è¡¨å•æ•°æ®"
        header-bordered
      >
        <pre class="bg-gray-50 dark:bg-gray-800 p-4 rounded text-sm overflow-auto max-h-96">{{ JSON.stringify(model, null, 2) }}</pre>
      </DuxCard>
    </div>
  </DuxPageForm>

<script setup lang="ts">
import { DuxCard, DuxCardPage } from '@duxweb/dvha-pro'
import { NCheckbox, NDropdown, NInput, NTag, NTooltip } from 'naive-ui'
import { h, ref } from 'vue'

const form = ref({
  title: '',
})
</script>

<template>
  <DuxCardPage
    v-slot="{ item, isChecked, toggleChecked }"
    checkable
    row-key="id"
    path="article"
    :filter="form"
    :filter-schema="[
      {
        tag: NInput,
        label: 'å§“å',
        attrs: {
          'placeholder': 'è¯·è¾“å…¥æ ‡é¢˜',
          'v-model:value': [form, 'title'],
        },
      },
    ]"
    :tabs="[
      {
        label: 'å…¨éƒ¨',
        value: 'all',
      },
      {
        label: 'å‘å¸ƒ',
        value: 'enabled',
      },
      {
        label: 'è‰ç¨¿',
        value: 'disabled',
      },
    ]"
  >
    <DuxCard :key="item.id" size="none" class="relative group bg-elevated" bordered :shadow="false" divide header-size="none">
      <div class="absolute top-2 left-2 z-10  group-hover:block" :class="[isChecked(item.id) ? 'block' : 'hidden']">
        <NCheckbox :checked="isChecked(item.id)" @update:checked="toggleChecked(item.id)" />
      </div>
      <template #header>
        <div class="h-50 rounded-t overflow-hidden">
          <img :src="`https://picsum.photos/800/800?random=${item.id}`" alt="article" class="w-full h-full object-cover">
        </div>
      </template>

      <div class="flex flex-col gap-2">
        <div class="text-sm text-muted">
          {{ item.created_at }} | 1 åˆ†é’Ÿå‰
        </div>
        <div class="text-base font-bold">
          {{ item.title }}
        </div>
        <div class="text-sm text-muted line-clamp-2">
          {{ item.desc }}
        </div>
      </div>

      <template #footer>

              {{ item.status ? 'å‘å¸ƒ' : 'è‰ç¨¿' }}

<script setup lang="ts">

  title: '',

    :filter="form"
    :filter-schema="[
      {
        tag: NInput,
        label: 'é¡¹ç›®åç§°',
        attrs: {
          'placeholder': 'è¯·è¾“å…¥é¡¹ç›®åç§°',
          'v-model:value': [form, 'title'],
        },
      },
    ]"
    :tabs="[
      {
        label: 'å…¨éƒ¨',
        value: 'all',
      },
      {
        label: 'è¿›è¡Œä¸­',
        value: 'in_progress',
      },
      {
        label: 'å·²å®Œæˆ',
        value: 'completed',
      },
      {
        label: 'å·²ä¸­æ­¢',
        value: 'aborted',
      },
    ]"
  >
    <DuxCard divide>
      <template #header>
        <div class="flex items-center justify-between">

              <div class="text-base font-bold">
                è®¢å•å·ï¼š# {{ item.order_no }}
              </div>
              <NTag type="success" size="small">
                å·²ä»˜æ¬¾
              </NTag>
            </div>
            <div class="text-sm text-muted">
              {{ item.products.length }} ä¸ªå•†å“ | {{ item.username }} | {{ item.city }} | {{ item.created_at }}
            </div>
          </div>

            <NButton>
              <template #icon>

        <DuxMedia
          v-for="product in item.products"
          :key="product.id"
          :title="product.title"
          :image="`https://picsum.photos/800/800?random=${item.id}-${product.id}`"

File: /apps/start/pages/form.vue

<script setup lang="ts">
import { createS3UploadDriver, useSelect, useUpload } from '@duxweb/dvha-core'
import { NButton, NDataTable, useMessage } from 'naive-ui'
import { h, onMounted, ref } from 'vue'

const model = ref({
  name: '',
  asyncSelect: 40,
})

const { options, onSearch } = useSelect({
  path: 'user',
  optionLabel: 'nickname',
  defaultValue: model.value.asyncSelect,
})

function handleSearch(value: string) {
  onSearch(value)
}

const message = useMessage()

const { trigger, uploadFiles, open, removeFiles, cancelFiles, progress, clearFiles, addDataFiles } = useUpload({
  path: 'upload',
  method: 'POST',
  multiple: false,
  driver: createS3UploadDriver({
    signPath: 'uploadSign',
  }),
  onError: (error) => {
    message.error(error.message || 'ä¸Šä¼ å¤±è´¥')
  },
})

onMounted(() => {
  addDataFiles([
    {
      url: 'https://www.baidu.com/img/PCtm_d9c8750bed0b3c7d089fa7d55720d6cf.png',
      filename: 'test.png',
      filetype: 'image/png',
      filesize: 1000,
    },
  ])
})
</script>

<template>
  <div class="p-4">
    <n-form
      :model="model"
      label-placement="left"
      :label-width="160"
    >
      <n-form-item label="æ–‡æœ¬æ¡†" path="name">
        <n-input v-model:value="model.name" />
      </n-form-item>

      <n-form-item label="å¼‚æ­¥é€‰æ‹©å™¨" path="async-select">
        <n-select v-model:value="model.asyncSelect" :options="options" placeholder="è¯·é€‰æ‹©ç”¨æˆ·" clearable filterable remote @search="handleSearch" />
      </n-form-item>

      <n-form-item label="ä¸Šä¼ " path="upload">
        <div class="flex flex-col gap-2 flex-1 min-h-0">
          <div class="flex items-center gap-2">
            <NButton @click="() => open()">
              é€‰æ‹©æ–‡ä»¶
            </NButton>
            <NButton @click="trigger">
              ä¸Šä¼  {{ progress.totalPercent }}%
            </NButton>
            <NButton @click="clearFiles">
              æ¸…ç©º
            </NButton>
          </div>
          <div class="flex flex-col gap-2">
            <NDataTable
              :bordered="true"
              :columns="[
                {
                  key: 'filename',
                  title: 'æ–‡ä»¶å',
                },
                {
                  key: 'filesizeText',
                  title: 'å¤§å°',
                },
                {
                  key: 'filetype',
                  title: 'ç±»å‹',
                },
                {
                  key: 'status',
                  title: 'çŠ¶æ€',
                  render: (row) => {
                    return h('div', {
                      class: 'flex flex-col gap-2',
                    }, [
                      h('div', {}, row.status),
                      h('div', { class: 'text-red-500' }, row?.error),
                    ])
                  },
                },
                {
                  key: 'progress.percent',
                  title: 'è¿›åº¦',
                  render: (row) => {
                    return `${row.progress?.percent}%`
                  },
                },
                {
                  key: 'progress.speedText',
                  title: 'é€Ÿåº¦',
                },
                {
                  key: 'progress.uploadTime',
                  title: 'ä¸Šä¼ æ—¶é—´',
                  render: (row) => {
                    return `${row.progress?.uploadTime} seconds`
                  },
                },
                {
                  key: 'progress.remainingTime',
                  title: 'å‰©ä½™æ—¶é—´',
                  render: (row) => {
                    return `${row.progress?.remainingTime} seconds`
                  },
                },
                {
                  key: 'actions',
                  title: 'æ“ä½œ',
                  render: (row) => {
                    return h('div', {
                      class: 'flex items-center gap-2',
                    }, [
                      h(NButton, {
                        type: 'warning',
                        size: 'small',
                        disabled: row.status === 'success' || row.status === 'error' || row.status === 'cancelled',
                        onClick: () => {
                          cancelFiles([row.id])
                        },
                      }, { default: () => 'å–æ¶ˆ' }),
                      h(NButton, {
                        type: 'error',
                        size: 'small',
                        onClick: () => {
                          removeFiles([row.id])
                        },
                      }, { default: () => 'åˆ é™¤' }),
                    ])
                  },
                },
              ]"
              :data="uploadFiles"
            />
          </div>
        </div>
      </n-form-item>
    </n-form>
  </div>
</template>

<style scoped>
</style>

<script setup lang="ts">
import { DuxCard, DuxCarousel, DuxChart, DuxDashboardQuick, DuxMedia, DuxWidgetConnect } from '@duxweb/dvha-pro'
import { NAvatar, NButton, NCalendar, NCard, NScrollbar, NTabPane, NTabs, NTag } from 'naive-ui'
import { computed, ref } from 'vue'

// ç”Ÿæˆéšæœºæ•°çš„å·¥å…·å‡½æ•°
function randomBetween(min: number, max: number): number {
  return Math.floor(Math.random() * (max - min + 1)) + min
}

function randomFloat(min: number, max: number, decimals: number = 2): number {
  return Number((Math.random() * (max - min) + min).toFixed(decimals))
}

// é¡¶éƒ¨ç»Ÿè®¡æ•°æ®
const topStats = ref([
  {
    label: 'ä»Šæ—¥è®¢å•',
    icon: 'i-tabler:shopping-cart',
    value: randomBetween(45, 180),
  },
  {
    label: 'å¾…å‘è´§',
    icon: 'i-tabler:truck',
    value: randomBetween(15, 65),
  },
  {
    label: 'å¾…å¤„ç†å”®å',
    icon: 'i-tabler:headset',
    value: randomBetween(3, 18),
  },
])

// è®¢å•è¶‹åŠ¿å›¾è¡¨æ•°æ®

  title: 'è¿‘7å¤©è®¢å•è¶‹åŠ¿',
  labels: ['12-02', '12-03', '12-04', '12-05', '12-06', '12-07', '12-08'],
  data: [
    {
      name: 'è®¢å•é‡',
      type: 'bar',
      data: Array.from({ length: 7 }, () => randomBetween(80, 200)),
      color: '#18a058',
    },
    {
      name: 'é”€å”®é¢(ä¸‡)',
      type: 'line',
      data: Array.from({ length: 7 }, () => randomFloat(15, 45, 1)),
      color: '#2080f0',
    },
  ],
})

  showYAxisLabel: true,

    type: 'success' as const,
    tag: 'æ´»åŠ¨',
    content: 'åŒ12è´­ç‰©èŠ‚æ´»åŠ¨å³å°†å¼€å§‹ï¼Œä¼˜æƒ åŠ›åº¦ç©ºå‰',
  },
  {
    type: 'info' as const,
    tag: 'ç³»ç»Ÿ',
    content: 'è®¢å•ç®¡ç†ç³»ç»Ÿå‡çº§å®Œæˆï¼Œæ–°å¢æ‰¹é‡å¤„ç†åŠŸèƒ½',
  },
  {
    type: 'warning' as const,
    tag: 'æé†’',
    content: 'éƒ¨åˆ†å•†å“åº“å­˜ç´§å¼ ï¼Œè¯·åŠæ—¶è¡¥è´§',
  },
  {
    type: 'info' as const,
    tag: 'é€šçŸ¥',
    content: 'æ–°å¢æ”¯ä»˜æ–¹å¼ï¼šæ”¯æŒå¾®ä¿¡åˆ†ä»˜ã€èŠ±å‘—åˆ†æœŸ',
  },
  {
    type: 'success' as const,
    tag: 'æ´»åŠ¨',
    content: 'æ–°ç”¨æˆ·æ³¨å†Œé€100å…ƒä¼˜æƒ åˆ¸æ´»åŠ¨è¿›è¡Œä¸­',
  },
  {
    type: 'info' as const,
    tag: 'ç³»ç»Ÿ',
    content: 'ç‰©æµè·Ÿè¸ªç³»ç»Ÿä¼˜åŒ–ï¼Œæ”¯æŒå®æ—¶ä½ç½®æŸ¥è¯¢',
  },
]

// è½®æ’­å›¾æ•°æ®
const carouselData = [
  'https://picsum.photos/400/200?random=1',
  'https://picsum.photos/400/200?random=2',
  'https://picsum.photos/400/200?random=3',
  'https://picsum.photos/400/200?random=4',
]

// åˆ·æ–°æ•°æ®
function refreshData() {
  topStats.value.forEach((stat) => {
    switch (stat.label) {
      case 'ä»Šæ—¥è®¢å•':
        stat.value = randomBetween(45, 180)
        break
      case 'å¾…å‘è´§':
        stat.value = randomBetween(15, 65)
        break
      case 'å¾…å¤„ç†å”®å':
        stat.value = randomBetween(3, 18)
        break
    }
  })

  // åˆ·æ–°å›¾è¡¨æ•°æ®
  orderTrendData.value.data[0].data = Array.from({ length: 7 }, () => randomBetween(80, 200))
  orderTrendData.value.data[1].data = Array.from({ length: 7 }, () => randomFloat(15, 45, 1))

  // åˆ·æ–°é”€å”®ç»Ÿè®¡æ•°æ®
  salesStats.value.forEach((stat) => {
    stat.change = randomFloat(-15, 25, 1)
    stat.changeType = (Math.random() > 0.5 ? 'up' : 'down') as 'up' | 'down'

    switch (stat.title) {
      case 'ä»Šæ—¥é”€å”®é¢':
        stat.value = `Â¥${randomBetween(50000, 120000).toLocaleString()}`
        break
      case 'ä»Šæ—¥è®¢å•æ•°':
        stat.value = randomBetween(150, 350)
        break
      case 'å¹³å‡å®¢å•ä»·':
        stat.value = `Â¥${randomFloat(280, 580, 0)}`
        break
      case 'è½¬åŒ–ç‡':
        stat.value = `${randomFloat(8, 18, 2)}%`
        break
    }
  })
}

// è·å–è®¢å•çŠ¶æ€æ˜¾ç¤º
function getOrderStatusDisplay(status: number) {
  switch (status) {
    case 1:
      return { text: 'å¾…å‘è´§', class: 'text-warning bg-warning/10' }
    case 2:
      return { text: 'é…é€ä¸­', class: 'text-info bg-info/10' }
    case 3:
      return { text: 'å·²å®Œæˆ', class: 'text-success bg-success/10' }
    default:
      return { text: 'æœªçŸ¥', class: 'text-gray bg-gray/10' }
  }
}

// è·å–å˜åŒ–æŒ‡ç¤ºå™¨æ ·å¼
function getChangeIndicator(change: number, changeType: 'up' | 'down') {
  const isPositive = changeType === 'up'
  return {
    icon: isPositive ? 'i-tabler:arrow-up' : 'i-tabler:arrow-down',
    class: isPositive ? 'text-success' : 'text-error',
    text: `${isPositive ? '+' : ''}${change}%`,
  }
}
</script>

<template>
  <DuxPage :card="false">
    <div class="flex gap-2 flex-col lg:flex-row">
      <div class="flex-1 flex flex-col gap-2 lg:w-1">

              ç”µå•†ç®¡ç†å¹³å°

              åŸºäº Vue3 å’Œ Naive UI çš„ç”µå•†ç®¡ç†ç³»ç»Ÿ

          <div class="flex items-center text-lg italic">
            ä¸“ä¸šã€é«˜æ•ˆã€å¯é

<script setup lang="ts">
import { DuxCard, DuxPage, useDialog, useDrawer, useModal } from '@duxweb/dvha-pro'
import {
  NAlert,
  NButton,
  NDropdown,
  NInput,
  NPopconfirm,
  NPopover,
  NSwitch,
  NTooltip,
  useLoadingBar,
  useMessage,
  useDialog as useNaiveDialog,
  useNotification,
} from 'naive-ui'
import { h } from 'vue'

// åŸºç¡€æ•°æ®ï¼ˆå·²åˆ é™¤ä¸ä½¿ç”¨çš„å˜é‡ï¼‰

// NaiveUI äº¤äº’ hooks
const message = useMessage()
const notification = useNotification()
const naiveDialog = useNaiveDialog()
const loadingBar = useLoadingBar()

// Pro åº“äº¤äº’ hooks
const modal = useModal()
const dialog = useDialog()
const drawer = useDrawer()

// æ¶ˆæ¯é€šçŸ¥æ–¹æ³•
function showMessage(type: 'info' | 'success' | 'warning' | 'error') {
  const messages = {
    info: 'è¿™æ˜¯ä¸€æ¡ä¿¡æ¯æ¶ˆæ¯',
    success: 'æ“ä½œæˆåŠŸï¼',
    warning: 'è¯·æ³¨æ„è¿™ä¸ªè­¦å‘Š',
    error: 'æ“ä½œå¤±è´¥ï¼Œè¯·é‡è¯•',
  }
  message[type](messages[type])
}

// é€šçŸ¥æ–¹æ³•
function showNotification(type: 'info' | 'success' | 'warning' | 'error') {
  const notifications = {
    info: { title: 'ä¿¡æ¯é€šçŸ¥', content: 'è¿™æ˜¯ä¸€æ¡ä¿¡æ¯é€šçŸ¥ï¼Œç”¨äºå±•ç¤ºä¸€èˆ¬æ€§ä¿¡æ¯' },
    success: { title: 'æˆåŠŸé€šçŸ¥', content: 'æ“ä½œå·²æˆåŠŸå®Œæˆï¼Œæ•°æ®å·²ä¿å­˜' },
    warning: { title: 'è­¦å‘Šé€šçŸ¥', content: 'è¯·æ³¨æ„ï¼ŒæŸäº›æ“ä½œå¯èƒ½å­˜åœ¨é£é™©' },
    error: { title: 'é”™è¯¯é€šçŸ¥', content: 'æ“ä½œå¤±è´¥ï¼Œè¯·æ£€æŸ¥ç½‘ç»œè¿æ¥æˆ–è”ç³»ç®¡ç†å‘˜' },
  }
  notification[type](notifications[type])
}

// NaiveUI å¯¹è¯æ¡†
function showNaiveDialog(type: 'info' | 'success' | 'warning' | 'error') {
  const dialogs = {
    info: { title: 'ä¿¡æ¯å¯¹è¯æ¡†', content: 'è¿™æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªä¿¡æ¯å¯¹è¯æ¡†ï¼Œç”¨äºå±•ç¤ºé‡è¦ä¿¡æ¯' },
    success: { title: 'æˆåŠŸå¯¹è¯æ¡†', content: 'æ“ä½œæˆåŠŸå®Œæˆï¼' },
    warning: { title: 'è­¦å‘Šå¯¹è¯æ¡†', content: 'è¯·ç¡®è®¤æ˜¯å¦ç»§ç»­æ­¤æ“ä½œï¼Ÿ' },
    error: { title: 'é”™è¯¯å¯¹è¯æ¡†', content: 'å‘ç”Ÿäº†é”™è¯¯ï¼Œè¯·é‡è¯•æˆ–è”ç³»æŠ€æœ¯æ”¯æŒ' },
  }
  naiveDialog[type](dialogs[type])
}

// åŠ è½½æ¡
function showLoadingBar() {
  loadingBar.start()
  setTimeout(() => {
    loadingBar.finish()
  }, 2000)
}

function showErrorLoadingBar() {
  loadingBar.start()
  setTimeout(() => {
    loadingBar.error()
  }, 2000)
}

// Pro Modal ç¤ºä¾‹
function showModal() {
  modal.show({
    title: 'å¼‚æ­¥æ¡†ç¤ºä¾‹',
    width: '600px',
    component: () => import('./form/modal.vue'),
    componentProps: {
      message: 'è¿™æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ª Pro æ¨¡æ€æ¡†ç¤ºä¾‹',
    },
  })
}

function showSimpleModal() {
  modal.show({
    title: 'ç®€å•å†…å®¹æ¨¡æ€æ¡†',
    width: '500px',
    component: () => Promise.resolve({
      setup() {
        return () => h('div', { class: 'p-6' }, [
          h('h3', { class: 'text-lg font-semibold mb-4' }, 'æ¨¡æ€æ¡†å†…å®¹'),
          h('p', { class: 'text-muted mb-4' }, 'è¿™æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªç®€å•çš„æ¨¡æ€æ¡†å†…å®¹ç¤ºä¾‹ã€‚'),
          h('div', { class: 'flex justify-end gap-2' }, [
            h(NButton, {
              onClick: () => {
                message.success('æ“ä½œæˆåŠŸ')
              },
            }, { default: () => 'ç¡®å®š' }),
          ]),
        ])
      },
    }),
  })
}

// Pro Dialog ç¤ºä¾‹
function showProDialog(type: 'confirm' | 'success' | 'error') {
  const dialogs = {
    confirm: {
      title: 'ç¡®è®¤æ“ä½œ',
      content: 'ç¡®å®šè¦æ‰§è¡Œè¿™ä¸ªæ“ä½œå—ï¼Ÿæ­¤æ“ä½œä¸å¯æ’¤é”€ã€‚',
    },
    success: {
      title: 'æ“ä½œæˆåŠŸ',
      content: 'æ‚¨çš„æ“ä½œå·²æˆåŠŸå®Œæˆï¼',
    },
    error: {
      title: 'æ“ä½œå¤±è´¥',
      content: 'æ“ä½œæ‰§è¡Œå¤±è´¥ï¼Œè¯·ç¨åé‡è¯•ã€‚',
    },
  }

  dialog[type](dialogs[type]).then(() => {
    if (type === 'confirm') {
      message.success('å·²ç¡®è®¤æ“ä½œ')
    }
  }).catch(() => {
    if (type === 'confirm') {
      message.info('å·²å–æ¶ˆæ“ä½œ')
    }
  })
}

function showPromptDialog() {
  dialog.prompt({
    title: 'è¾“å…¥ä¿¡æ¯',
    formSchema: [
      {
        name: 'username',
        label: 'ç”¨æˆ·å',
        tag: NInput,
        required: true,
        placeholder: 'è¯·è¾“å…¥ç”¨æˆ·å',
      },
      {
        name: 'email',
        label: 'é‚®ç®±',
        tag: NInput,
        required: true,
        placeholder: 'è¯·è¾“å…¥é‚®ç®±åœ°å€',
      },
    ],
  }).then((result) => {
    message.success(`ç”¨æˆ·å: ${result.username}, é‚®ç®±: ${result.email}`)
  }).catch(() => {
    message.info('å·²å–æ¶ˆè¾“å…¥')
  })
}

function showNodeDialog() {
  dialog.node({
    title: 'è‡ªå®šä¹‰å†…å®¹å¯¹è¯æ¡†',
    render: () => h('div', { class: 'p-4' }, [
      h('div', { class: 'mb-4' }, [
        h('h4', { class: 'text-base font-medium mb-2' }, 'è‡ªå®šä¹‰å†…å®¹'),
        h('p', { class: 'text-sm text-muted' }, 'è¿™æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªåŒ…å«è‡ªå®šä¹‰ Vue èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„å¯¹è¯æ¡†ã€‚'),
      ]),
      h('div', { class: 'grid grid-cols-2 gap-4' }, [
        h('div', { class: 'p-3 bg-blue-50 rounded' }, [
          h('div', { class: 'text-sm font-medium text-blue-800' }, 'ä¿¡æ¯å¡ç‰‡'),
          h('div', { class: 'text-xs text-blue-600 mt-1' }, 'è¿™æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªä¿¡æ¯å¡ç‰‡'),
        ]),
        h('div', { class: 'p-3 bg-green-50 rounded' }, [
          h('div', { class: 'text-sm font-medium text-green-800' }, 'çŠ¶æ€å¡ç‰‡'),
          h('div', { class: 'text-xs text-green-600 mt-1' }, 'çŠ¶æ€æ­£å¸¸'),
        ]),
      ]),
    ]),
  }).then(() => {
    message.success('å¯¹è¯æ¡†å·²ç¡®è®¤')
  })
}

// Pro Drawer ç¤ºä¾‹
function showDrawer() {
  drawer.show({
    title: 'æŠ½å±‰ç¤ºä¾‹',
    width: '400px',
    component: () => Promise.resolve({
      setup() {
        return () => h('div', { class: 'p-6' }, [
          h('h3', { class: 'text-lg font-semibold mb-4' }, 'æŠ½å±‰å†…å®¹'),
          h('p', { class: 'text-muted mb-4' }, 'è¿™æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ª Pro æŠ½å±‰ç»„ä»¶ç¤ºä¾‹ã€‚'),
          h('div', { class: 'space-y-3' }, [
            h('div', { class: 'flex items-center justify-between p-3 rounded' }, [
              h('span', { class: 'text-sm' }, 'è®¾ç½®é¡¹ 1'),
              h(NSwitch, { defaultValue: true }),
            ]),
            h('div', { class: 'flex items-center justify-between p-3 rounded' }, [
              h('span', { class: 'text-sm' }, 'è®¾ç½®é¡¹ 2'),
              h(NSwitch, { defaultValue: false }),
            ]),
            h('div', { class: 'flex items-center justify-between p-3 rounded' }, [
              h('span', { class: 'text-sm' }, 'è®¾ç½®é¡¹ 3'),
              h(NSwitch, { defaultValue: true }),
            ]),
          ]),
        ])
      },
    }),
  })
}

// ä¸‹æ‹‰èœå•é€‰é¡¹
const dropdownOptions = [
  {
    label: 'ç¼–è¾‘',
    key: 'edit',
  },
  {
    label: 'å¤åˆ¶',
    key: 'copy',
  },
  {
    label: 'åˆ é™¤',
    key: 'delete',
  },
]

function handleDropdownSelect(key: string) {
  message.info(`é€‰æ‹©äº†: ${key}`)
}

// ç¡®è®¤æ“ä½œ
function handleConfirm() {
  message.success('ç¡®è®¤æ“ä½œ')
}

function handleCancel() {
  message.info('å–æ¶ˆæ“ä½œ')
}
</script>

<template>
  <DuxPage :card="false">
    <div class="max-w-6xl mx-auto p-4">
      <div class="flex flex-col gap-4">
        <!-- Pro åº“äº¤äº’ç»„ä»¶ -->
        <div class="grid grid-cols-1 lg:grid-cols-3 gap-4">
          <!-- Modal æ¨¡æ€æ¡† -->
          <DuxCard title="Modal æ¨¡æ€æ¡†" description="æ”¯æŒå¼‚æ­¥ç»„ä»¶çš„æ¨¡æ€æ¡†ç»„ä»¶">
            <div class="flex flex-col gap-3">
              <NButton block @click="showModal">
                å¤æ‚æ¨¡æ€æ¡†
              </NButton>
              <NButton block @click="showSimpleModal">
                ç®€å•æ¨¡æ€æ¡†
              </NButton>
            </div>
          </DuxCard>

          <!-- Dialog å¯¹è¯æ¡† -->
          <DuxCard title="Dialog å¯¹è¯æ¡†" description="Pro åº“æä¾›çš„é«˜çº§å¯¹è¯æ¡†ç»„ä»¶">
            <div class="flex flex-col gap-3">
              <NButton block @click="showProDialog('confirm')">
                ç¡®è®¤å¯¹è¯æ¡†
              </NButton>
              <NButton block @click="showProDialog('success')">
                æˆåŠŸå¯¹è¯æ¡†
              </NButton>
              <NButton block @click="showProDialog('error')">
                é”™è¯¯å¯¹è¯æ¡†
              </NButton>
              <NButton block @click="showPromptDialog">
                è¡¨å•å¯¹è¯æ¡†
              </NButton>
              <NButton block @click="showNodeDialog">
                è‡ªå®šä¹‰å¯¹è¯æ¡†
              </NButton>
            </div>
          </DuxCard>

          <!-- Drawer æŠ½å±‰ -->
          <DuxCard title="Drawer æŠ½å±‰" description="ä¾§è¾¹æ»‘å‡ºçš„æŠ½å±‰ç»„ä»¶">
            <div class="flex flex-col gap-3">
              <NButton block @click="showDrawer">
                æ˜¾ç¤ºæŠ½å±‰
              </NButton>
            </div>
          </DuxCard>
        </div>

        <!-- NaiveUI äº¤äº’ç»„ä»¶ -->
        <div class="grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-4 gap-4">
          <!-- æ¶ˆæ¯é€šçŸ¥ -->
          <DuxCard title="æ¶ˆæ¯é€šçŸ¥" description="è½»é‡çº§çš„æ¶ˆæ¯æç¤ºï¼Œç”¨äºæ“ä½œåé¦ˆ">
            <div class="flex flex-col gap-3">
              <NButton type="info" block @click="showMessage('info')">
                ä¿¡æ¯æ¶ˆæ¯
              </NButton>

File: /apps/start/pages/list.vue

<script setup lang="ts">
import { useInfiniteList } from '@duxweb/dvha-core'
import { NInfiniteScroll } from 'naive-ui'
import { ref } from 'vue'

const pagination = ref({
  page: 1,
  pageSize: 20,
})

const filters = ref({
  keyword: '',
})

const { data, isLoading, fetchNextPage, hasNextPage } = useInfiniteList({
  path: 'user',
  pagination: pagination.value,
  filters: filters.value,
})

function handleLoad() {
  if (hasNextPage.value) {
    fetchNextPage()
  }
}
</script>

<template>
  <div class="h-full flex flex-col gap-2">
    <div class="flex gap-4 items-center">
      <NInput v-model:value="filters.keyword" placeholder="æœç´¢" />
    </div>

    <NInfiniteScroll :distance="10" class="flex-1 h-auto" @load="handleLoad">
      <template v-for="(page, key) in data?.pages" :key="key">
        <div
          v-for="(item, index) in page?.data || []"
          :key="index"
          class="flex gap-2 items-center my-2 p-4 bg-gray-9"
        >
          <img :src="item.avatar" class="size-10">
          <div class="flex flex-col gap-1">
            <div class="text-sm">
              {{ item.nickname }}
            </div>
            <div class="text-xs text-gray-500">
              {{ item.email }}
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
        <div v-if="isLoading" class="text-center">
          åŠ è½½ä¸­...
        </div>
        <div v-if="!hasNextPage" class="text-center">
          æ²¡æœ‰æ›´å¤šäº† ğŸ¤ª
        </div>
      </template>
    </NInfiniteScroll>
  </div>
</template>

<style scoped>
</style>

File: /apps/start/pages/login.vue
---

<script setup lang="ts">
import type { FormInst } from 'naive-ui'
import { useLogin } from '@duxweb/dvha-core'
import { useMessage } from 'naive-ui'
import { reactive, ref } from 'vue'
import { useRouter } from 'vue-router'

const router = useRouter()
const message = useMessage()

const formRef = ref<FormInst | null>(null)

const formModel = reactive({
  username: '',
  password: '',
  remember: false,
})

const rules = {
  username: [
    { required: true, message: 'è¯·è¾“å…¥ç”¨æˆ·å', trigger: 'blur' },
  ],
  password: [
    { required: true, message: 'è¯·è¾“å…¥å¯†ç ', trigger: 'blur' },
  ],
}

const { mutate, isLoading } = useLogin({
  onSuccess: () => {
    message.success('ç™»å½•æˆåŠŸ')
  },
  onError: (error) => {
    message.error(error?.message || 'ç™»å½•å¤±è´¥ï¼Œè¯·æ£€æŸ¥ç”¨æˆ·åå’Œå¯†ç ')
  },
})

function handleSubmit() {
  if (!formRef.value)
    return

  formRef.value.validate((errors) => {
    if (errors)
      return

    mutate({
      username: formModel.username,
      password: formModel.password,
      code: '0000',
    })
  })
}
</script>

<template>
  <div class="flex justify-center items-center min-h-screen bg-gray-100">
    <div class="w-400px p-40px rounded-8px bg-white shadow-sm">
      <div class="text-center mb-40px">
        <h1 class="m-0 mb-8px text-24px font-600 text-gray-800">
          ç³»ç»Ÿç™»å½•
        </h1>
        <p class="m-0 text-gray-500 text-14px">
          æ¬¢è¿ä½¿ç”¨ç®¡ç†ç³»ç»Ÿï¼Œè¯·ç™»å½•
        </p>
      </div>

      <n-form
        ref="formRef"
        :model="formModel"
        :rules="rules"
        label-placement="left"
      >
        <n-form-item path="username">
          <n-input
            v-model:value="formModel.username"
            placeholder="è¯·è¾“å…¥ç”¨æˆ·å"
          >
            <template #prefix>
              <div class="i-tabler:user size-4" />
            </template>
          </n-input>
        </n-form-item>

        <n-form-item path="password">
          <n-input
            v-model:value="formModel.password"
            type="password"
            placeholder="è¯·è¾“å…¥å¯†ç "
            show-password-on="click"
          >
            <template #prefix>
              <div class="i-tabler:lock size-4" />
            </template>
          </n-input>
        </n-form-item>

        <div class="flex justify-between items-center mb-4">
          <n-checkbox v-model:checked="formModel.remember">
            è®°ä½æˆ‘
          </n-checkbox>
          <n-button text>
            å¿˜è®°å¯†ç ï¼Ÿ
          </n-button>
        </div>

        <n-button
          type="primary"
          block
          :loading="isLoading"
          @click="handleSubmit"
        >
          ç™»å½•
        </n-button>

        <div class="flex justify-center items-center mt-6 text-14px text-gray-500">
          <span>è¿˜æ²¡æœ‰è´¦å·ï¼Ÿ</span>
          <n-button text class="ml-2 text-primary" @click="router.push('/register')">
            ç«‹å³æ³¨å†Œ
          </n-button>
        </div>
      </n-form>
    </div>
  </div>
</template>

<style scoped>
/* æ‰€æœ‰CSSæ ·å¼å·²æ›¿æ¢ä¸ºUnoCSSåŸå­ç±» */
</style>

<script setup>
import { useJsonSchema } from '@duxweb/dvha-core'
import { DuxPage } from '@duxweb/dvha-pro'
import { computed, ref } from 'vue'

const data = ref({
  name: 'å¼ ä¸‰',
  age: 18,
  gender: 'ç”·',
  address: 'åŒ—äº¬å¸‚æµ·æ·€åŒº',
  phone: '12345678901',
  email: 'zhangsan@example.com',
  isMarried: false,
  showDetails: true,
  selectedColor: 'blue',
  interests: ['ç¼–ç¨‹', 'é˜…è¯»', 'éŸ³ä¹'],
  counter: 0,
})

const interestOptions = ref([
  { label: 'ç¼–ç¨‹', value: 'ç¼–ç¨‹' },
  { label: 'é˜…è¯»', value: 'é˜…è¯»' },
  { label: 'éŸ³ä¹', value: 'éŸ³ä¹' },
  { label: 'è¿åŠ¨', value: 'è¿åŠ¨' },
  { label: 'æ—…è¡Œ', value: 'æ—…è¡Œ' },
  { label: 'æ‘„å½±', value: 'æ‘„å½±' },
])

  { label: 'è“è‰²', value: 'blue' },
  { label: 'çº¢è‰²', value: 'red' },
  { label: 'ç»¿è‰²', value: 'green' },
  { label: 'ç´«è‰²', value: 'purple' },
])

const testData = ref({
  user: {
    role: 'admin',
    permissions: ['read', 'write', 'delete'],
    settings: {
      theme: 'dark',
      language: 'zh-CN',
    },
  },
  app: {
    version: '1.0.0',
    debug: true,
  },
  numbers: [1, 2, 3, 4, 5],
  config: {
    maxItems: 3,
    showAdvanced: false,
  },
  utils: {
    formatRole: role => `è§’è‰²ï¼š${role}`,
    checkPermission: (permissions, required) => permissions.includes(required),
    multiply: (a, b) => a * b,
  },

    },

          },
        ],
      },
      {
        tag: 'div',
        attrs: {
          'v-show': 'testData.app.debug',
          'class': 'p-3 bg-yellow/10 border border-yellow rounded mb-3',
        },
        children: [

              class: 'text-yellow-600 mb-2',
            },

            children: 'ä¸»é¢˜è®¾ç½®ï¼š{{testData.user.settings.theme}}',

        ],
      },
      {
        tag: 'div',
        attrs: {
          class: 'mt-3',
        },
        children: 'é€‰æ‹©æ›´å¤šå…´è¶£ï¼š',
      },
      {
        tag: 'n-select',
        attrs: {
          'v-model:value': [data.value, 'interests'],
          'options': interestOptions.value,
          'multiple': true,
          'placeholder': 'é€‰æ‹©å…´è¶£çˆ±å¥½',
          'class': 'mt-2',
        },
      },
    ],
  },

  // v-on äº‹ä»¶å¤„ç†ç¤ºä¾‹
  {
    tag: 'n-card',
    attrs: {
      title: 'v-on äº‹ä»¶å¤„ç†ç¤ºä¾‹',

    children: [
      {
        tag: 'div',

      },
      {
        tag: 'n-space',
        children: [

              '@click': () => data.value.counter++,
              'type': 'primary',

            children: 'å¢åŠ ',
          },
          {
            tag: 'n-button',
            attrs: {
              '@click': () => data.value.counter--,
              'type': 'default',
            },
            children: 'å‡å°‘',
          },
          {
            tag: 'n-button',
            attrs: {
              '@click': () => data.value.counter = 0,
              'type': 'warning',
            },
            children: 'é‡ç½®',
          },
          {
            tag: 'n-button',
            attrs: {
              '@click.stop': (e) => {
                e.preventDefault()
                // æŸ¥çœ‹å½“å‰è®¡æ•°å€¼
                data.value.name = `${data.value.name} (è®¡æ•°:${data.value.counter})`

            },

          'v-if': data.value.age >= 18,

            },
            children: 'ğŸ‰ æˆå¹´äººä¸“åŒº',

              'v-if': data.value.interests.length > 0,
            },

  // slot æ’æ§½ç¤ºä¾‹

          prefix: () => ({
            tag: 'n-tag',
            attrs: {
              size: 'small',
              type: 'info',
            },
            children: 'ğŸ“±',
          }),

              'size': 'small',

                  data.value.email = 'éªŒè¯é€šè¿‡âœ…'

                else {
                  data.value.email = 'è¯·è¾“å…¥11ä½æ‰‹æœºå·âŒ'
                }
              },
            },
            children: 'éªŒè¯',
          }),
        },
      },
    ],
  },

  // æ•°å­—æ˜¾ç¤ºç¤ºä¾‹

    tag: 'n-card',
    attrs: {
      title: 'åŠ¨æ€æ•°å­—æ˜¾ç¤º',

              'type': 'info',
              'size': 'small',
            },
            children: '+5',
          },
          {
            tag: 'n-button',
            attrs: {
              '@click': () => data.value.counter -= 1,
              'type': 'warning',
              'size': 'small',
            },
            children: '-1',
          },
          {
            tag: 'n-button',
            attrs: {
              '@click': () => data.value.counter = Math.max(0, data.value.counter - 5),
              'type': 'error',
              'size': 'small',
            },
            children: '-5',
          },
        ],
      },
      {
        tag: 'div',
        attrs: {
          class: 'p-3 bg-gray/10 rounded',
        },
        children: [
          {
            tag: 'p',
            attrs: {
              class: 'mb-2 text-sm text-gray-600',
            },
            children: 'åŠ¨æ€è®¡ç®—ç»“æœï¼š',
          },
          {
            tag: 'n-tag',
            attrs: {
              type: 'primary',
              size: 'large',
            },
            children: `${data.value.counter}Â² = ${data.value.counter * data.value.counter}`,
          },
          {
            tag: 'div',
            attrs: {
              class: 'mt-2',
            },
            children: [
              {
                tag: 'n-tag',
                attrs: {
                  type: 'success',
                  class: 'mr-2',
                },
                children: `âœ•2 = ${data.value.counter * 2}`,
              },
              {
                tag: 'n-tag',
                attrs: {
                  type: 'warning',
                },
                children: `Ã·2 = ${(data.value.counter / 2).toFixed(1)}`,
              },
            ],
          },
        ],
      },
    ],
  },

  // v-for æ•°å­—åˆ—è¡¨ç¤ºä¾‹
  {
    tag: 'n-card',
    attrs: {
      title: 'v-for æ•°å­—åˆ—è¡¨ç¤ºä¾‹',
      class: 'mb-4',
    },
    children: [
      {
        tag: 'p',
        attrs: {
          class: 'mb-2',
        },
        children: 'æ•°å­— 1-5 çš„åˆ—è¡¨ï¼š',
      },
      {
        tag: 'n-space',
        children: [
          {
            tag: 'n-tag',
            attrs: {
              'v-for': [1, 2, 3, 4, 5],
              'type': 'primary',
              'round': true,
            },
            children: 'Number: {{item}}',
          },
        ],
      },
      {
        tag: 'div',
        attrs: {
          class: 'mt-3 mb-2',
        },
        children: 'ä½¿ç”¨å¯¹è±¡æ ¼å¼çš„ v-forï¼š',
      },
      {
        tag: 'n-space',
        children: [
          {
            tag: 'n-tag',
            attrs: {
              'v-for': {
                list: ['çº¢è‰²', 'ç»¿è‰²', 'è“è‰²'],
                item: 'color',
                index: 'idx',
              },
              'type': 'info',
            },
            children: '{{idx}}: {{color}}',
          },
        ],
      },
    ],
  },
])

const { render } = useJsonSchema({
  data: schema,
  context: { testData },
  // components: naive,
})
</script>

<script setup lang="ts">
import { DuxCard, DuxChart, DuxMedia, DuxPage, DuxStatsNumber, DuxStatsRealTime, DuxStatsStore, DuxStatsStoreItem } from '@duxweb/dvha-pro'
import { NAlert, NButton, NDatePicker, NScrollbar } from 'naive-ui'
import { onMounted, ref } from 'vue'

// ç”Ÿæˆéšæœºæ•°çš„å·¥å…·å‡½æ•°
function randomBetween(min: number, max: number): number {
  return Math.floor(Math.random() * (max - min + 1)) + min
}

function randomFloat(min: number, max: number, decimals: number = 2): number {
  return Number((Math.random() * (max - min) + min).toFixed(decimals))
}

// å®æ—¶æ•°æ®å¡ç‰‡
const realTimeCards = ref([
  {
    label: 'ä»Šæ—¥è®¢å•',
    value: randomBetween(150, 500),
    color: 'text-primary',
  },
  {
    label: 'å¾…ä»˜æ¬¾',
    value: randomBetween(30, 120),
    color: 'text-warning',
  },
  {
    label: 'å¾…å‘è´§',
    value: randomBetween(20, 80),
    color: 'text-info',
  },
  {
    label: 'å¾…æ”¶è´§',
    value: randomBetween(40, 150),
    color: 'text-success',
  },
  {
    label: 'é€€æ¬¾ç”³è¯·',
    value: randomBetween(2, 15),
    color: 'text-error',
  },
  {
    label: 'åº“å­˜é¢„è­¦',
    value: randomBetween(5, 25),
    color: 'text-error',
  },
])

// å®æ—¶æ•°æ®å›¾è¡¨ï¼ˆåŒå›¾è¡¨ï¼‰
const realTimeCharts = ref([
  {
    title: 'ä»Šæ—¥é”€å”®é¢(å…ƒ)',
    value: (randomBetween(50000, 200000)).toLocaleString(),
    subtitle: 'è¾ƒæ˜¨æ—¥',
    change: randomFloat(-15, 25, 1),
    changeType: Math.random() > 0.5 ? 'up' : 'down' as const,
    data: Array.from({ length: 7 }, () => randomBetween(40000, 180000)),
    labels: ['å‘¨ä¸€', 'å‘¨äºŒ', 'å‘¨ä¸‰', 'å‘¨å››', 'å‘¨äº”', 'å‘¨å…­', 'å‘¨æ—¥'],
  },
  {
    title: 'ä»Šæ—¥è®¢å•æ•°',
    value: randomBetween(200, 800),
    subtitle: 'è¾ƒæ˜¨æ—¥',
    change: randomFloat(-10, 30, 1),
    changeType: Math.random() > 0.5 ? 'up' : 'down' as const,
    data: Array.from({ length: 7 }, () => randomBetween(150, 700)),
    labels: ['å‘¨ä¸€', 'å‘¨äºŒ', 'å‘¨ä¸‰', 'å‘¨å››', 'å‘¨äº”', 'å‘¨å…­', 'å‘¨æ—¥'],
  },
])

// åº—é“ºæ•°æ®ç»Ÿè®¡
const storeStats = ref([
  {
    title: 'æ”¯ä»˜è½¬åŒ–ç‡',
    value: `${randomFloat(8, 15, 2)}%`,
    subtitle: 'è¾ƒæ˜¨æ—¥',
    change: randomFloat(-5, 8, 1),
    changeType: Math.random() > 0.5 ? 'up' : 'down' as const,
  },
  {
    title: 'è®¿å®¢æ•°',
    value: randomBetween(2000, 8000).toLocaleString(),
    subtitle: 'è¾ƒæ˜¨æ—¥',
    change: randomFloat(-20, 35, 1),
    changeType: Math.random() > 0.5 ? 'up' : 'down' as const,
  },
  {
    title: 'æµè§ˆé‡',
    value: randomBetween(15000, 50000).toLocaleString(),
    subtitle: 'è¾ƒæ˜¨æ—¥',
    change: randomFloat(-15, 40, 1),
    changeType: Math.random() > 0.5 ? 'up' : 'down' as const,
  },
  {
    title: 'å®¢å•ä»·',
    value: `Â¥${randomFloat(180, 680, 2)}`,
    subtitle: 'è¾ƒæ˜¨æ—¥',
    change: randomFloat(-12, 25, 1),
    changeType: Math.random() > 0.5 ? 'up' : 'down' as const,
  },
  {
    title: 'å¤è´­ç‡',

    subtitle: 'è¾ƒæ˜¨æ—¥',
    change: randomFloat(-8, 12, 1),
    changeType: Math.random() > 0.5 ? 'up' : 'down' as const,
  },
  {
    title: 'å•†å“è¯„åˆ†',
    value: randomFloat(4.2, 4.9, 1),
    subtitle: 'è¾ƒæ˜¨æ—¥',
    change: randomFloat(-0.5, 0.3, 2),
    changeType: Math.random() > 0.5 ? 'up' : 'down' as const,
  },
])

// åº—é“ºç­‰çº§
const storeLevel = ref(randomBetween(1, 5))

// åº—é“ºä½™é¢ä¿¡æ¯
const storeBalance = ref({
  available: randomFloat(50000, 200000, 2),
  frozen: randomFloat(5000, 30000, 2),
})

// åº—é“ºæŠ¥å‘Šé›·è¾¾å›¾é…ç½®
const chartOptions = ref({
  indicator: [
    { name: 'å•†å“æè¿°', max: 5 },
    { name: 'æœåŠ¡æ€åº¦', max: 5 },
    { name: 'ç‰©æµé€Ÿåº¦', max: 5 },
    { name: 'å•†å“è´¨é‡', max: 5 },
    { name: 'å”®åæœåŠ¡', max: 5 },
    { name: 'è´­ç‰©ä½“éªŒ', max: 5 },
  ],
  data: [
    {
      name: 'å½“å‰è¯„åˆ†',
      value: Array.from({ length: 6 }, () => randomFloat(4.0, 5.0, 1)),
    },
  ],
})

// è½¬åŒ–æ¼æ–—æ•°æ®
const funnelData = ref([
  {
    name: 'å•†å“æµè§ˆ',
    rate: '100%',
    metrics: [
      { label: 'æµè§ˆäººæ•°', value: '0' },
      { label: 'æµè§ˆæ¬¡æ•°', value: '0' },
      { label: 'å¹³å‡åœç•™æ—¶é—´', value: '0' },
    ],
  },
  {
    name: 'å•†å“è¯¦æƒ…',
    rate: '0%',
    metrics: [
      { label: 'è¯¦æƒ…äººæ•°', value: '0' },
      { label: 'è¯¦æƒ…è®¿é—®é‡', value: '0' },
      { label: 'è·³å‡ºç‡', value: '0' },
    ],
  },
  {
    name: 'åŠ å…¥è´­ç‰©è½¦',
    rate: '0%',
    metrics: [
      { label: 'åŠ è´­äººæ•°', value: '0' },
      { label: 'åŠ è´­å•†å“æ•°', value: '0' },
      { label: 'åŠ è´­è½¬åŒ–ç‡', value: '0' },
    ],
  },
  {
    name: 'ä¸‹å•æ”¯ä»˜',
    rate: '0%',
    metrics: [
      { label: 'ä¸‹å•äººæ•°', value: '0' },
      { label: 'è®¢å•é‡‘é¢', value: '0' },
      { label: 'æ”¯ä»˜æˆåŠŸç‡', value: '0' },
    ],
  },
])

// éšæœºç”Ÿæˆè½¬åŒ–æ¼æ–—æ•°æ®çš„å‡½æ•°
function generateRandomFunnelData() {
  const baseVisitors = randomBetween(8000, 25000) // åŸºç¡€è®¿é—®é‡

  // ç”Ÿæˆé€’å‡çš„è½¬åŒ–ç‡
  const detailRate = randomFloat(60, 85)
  const cartRate = randomFloat(15, 35)
  const orderRate = randomFloat(5, 18)

  const detailVisitors = Math.floor(baseVisitors * detailRate / 100)
  const cartVisitors = Math.floor(baseVisitors * cartRate / 100)
  const orderVisitors = Math.floor(baseVisitors * orderRate / 100)

  funnelData.value = [
    {
      name: 'å•†å“æµè§ˆ',
      rate: '100%',
      metrics: [
        { label: 'æµè§ˆäººæ•°', value: baseVisitors.toLocaleString() },
        { label: 'æµè§ˆæ¬¡æ•°', value: Math.floor(baseVisitors * randomFloat(2.5, 4.5)).toLocaleString() },
        { label: 'å¹³å‡åœç•™æ—¶é—´', value: `${randomFloat(1.5, 4.5, 1)}åˆ†é’Ÿ` },
      ],
    },
    {
      name: 'å•†å“è¯¦æƒ…',
      rate: `${detailRate.toFixed(1)}%`,
      metrics: [
        { label: 'è¯¦æƒ…äººæ•°', value: detailVisitors.toLocaleString() },
        { label: 'è¯¦æƒ…è®¿é—®é‡', value: Math.floor(detailVisitors * randomFloat(1.2, 2.8)).toLocaleString() },
        { label: 'è·³å‡ºç‡', value: `${randomFloat(35, 65, 1)}%` },
      ],
    },
    {
      name: 'åŠ å…¥è´­ç‰©è½¦',
      rate: `${cartRate.toFixed(1)}%`,
      metrics: [
        { label: 'åŠ è´­äººæ•°', value: cartVisitors.toLocaleString() },
        { label: 'åŠ è´­å•†å“æ•°', value: Math.floor(cartVisitors * randomFloat(1.3, 2.5)).toLocaleString() },
        { label: 'åŠ è´­è½¬åŒ–ç‡', value: `${(cartRate / detailRate * 100).toFixed(1)}%` },
      ],
    },
    {
      name: 'ä¸‹å•æ”¯ä»˜',
      rate: `${orderRate.toFixed(1)}%`,
      metrics: [
        { label: 'ä¸‹å•äººæ•°', value: orderVisitors.toLocaleString() },
        { label: 'è®¢å•é‡‘é¢', value: `Â¥${(orderVisitors * randomFloat(200, 800)).toLocaleString()}` },
        { label: 'æ”¯ä»˜æˆåŠŸç‡', value: `${randomFloat(88, 96, 1)}%` },
      ],
    },
  ]
}

// åˆ·æ–°æ‰€æœ‰æ•°æ®
function refreshAllData() {
  // åˆ·æ–°å®æ—¶æ•°æ®å¡ç‰‡
  realTimeCards.value.forEach((card) => {
    switch (card.label) {
      case 'ä»Šæ—¥è®¢å•':
        card.value = randomBetween(150, 500)
        break
      case 'å¾…ä»˜æ¬¾':
        card.value = randomBetween(30, 120)
        break
      case 'å¾…å‘è´§':
        card.value = randomBetween(20, 80)
        break
      case 'å¾…æ”¶è´§':
        card.value = randomBetween(40, 150)
        break
      case 'é€€æ¬¾ç”³è¯·':
        card.value = randomBetween(2, 15)
        break
      case 'åº“å­˜é¢„è­¦':
        card.value = randomBetween(5, 25)
        break
    }
  })

  // åˆ·æ–°å®æ—¶å›¾è¡¨æ•°æ®
  realTimeCharts.value.forEach((chart) => {
    if (chart.title === 'ä»Šæ—¥é”€å”®é¢(å…ƒ)') {
      chart.value = randomBetween(50000, 200000).toLocaleString()
      chart.data = Array.from({ length: 7 }, () => randomBetween(40000, 180000))
    }
    else if (chart.title === 'ä»Šæ—¥è®¢å•æ•°') {
      chart.value = randomBetween(200, 800)
      chart.data = Array.from({ length: 7 }, () => randomBetween(150, 700))
    }
    chart.change = randomFloat(-15, 25, 1)
    chart.changeType = Math.random() > 0.5 ? 'up' : 'down'
  })

  // åˆ·æ–°åº—é“ºç»Ÿè®¡æ•°æ®
  storeStats.value.forEach((stat) => {
    stat.change = randomFloat(-15, 25, 1)
    stat.changeType = Math.random() > 0.5 ? 'up' : 'down'

    switch (stat.title) {
      case 'æ”¯ä»˜è½¬åŒ–ç‡':
        stat.value = `${randomFloat(8, 15, 2)}%`
        break
      case 'è®¿å®¢æ•°':
        stat.value = randomBetween(2000, 8000).toLocaleString()
        break
      case 'æµè§ˆé‡':
        stat.value = randomBetween(15000, 50000).toLocaleString()
        break
      case 'å®¢å•ä»·':
        stat.value = `Â¥${randomFloat(180, 680, 2)}`
        break
      case 'å¤è´­ç‡':
        stat.value = `${randomFloat(25, 45, 2)}%`
        break
      case 'å•†å“è¯„åˆ†':
        stat.value = randomFloat(4.2, 4.9, 1)
        break
    }
  })

  // åˆ·æ–°åº—é“ºä½™é¢
  storeBalance.value = {
    available: randomFloat(50000, 200000, 2),
    frozen: randomFloat(5000, 30000, 2),
  }

  // åˆ·æ–°é›·è¾¾å›¾æ•°æ®
  chartOptions.value.data[0].value = Array.from({ length: 6 }, () => randomFloat(4.0, 5.0, 1))

  // åˆ·æ–°è½¬åŒ–æ¼æ–—æ•°æ®
  generateRandomFunnelData()
}

// åˆå§‹åŒ–æ—¶ç”Ÿæˆéšæœºæ•°æ®
onMounted(() => {
  generateRandomFunnelData()
})

// å®šæ—¶åˆ·æ–°æ•°æ®ï¼ˆæ¯60ç§’ï¼‰
// setInterval(refreshAllData, 60000)
</script>

<template>
  <DuxPage :card="false">
    <div class="flex flex-col lg:flex-row gap-4">
      <div class="flex-1 min-w-0 flex flex-col gap-4">
        <DuxStatsRealTime
          title="å®æ—¶æ•°æ®"
          :subtitle="`æˆªæ­¢è‡³ ${new Date().toLocaleDateString()} ${new Date().toLocaleTimeString()}`"
          :cards="realTimeCards"
          :charts="realTimeCharts"
          style="min-height: 300px;"
        />

        <DuxCard title="åº—é“ºæ•°æ®" content-class="flex flex-col gap-4" footer-bordered>
          <NAlert type="info">
            æ¬¢è¿ä½¿ç”¨å•†åŸç®¡ç†ç³»ç»Ÿï¼Œå®æ—¶æŒæ¡åº—é“ºè¿è¥æ•°æ®
          </NAlert>

          <div class="flex flex-col lg:flex-row gap-4 py-4">
            <div class="flex flex-col w-40">
              <div class="flex gap-1 items-center text-muted">
                åº—é“ºç­‰çº§

                <div class="flex gap-1">
                  <div
                    v-for="i in 5" :key="i" class="size-3 rounded" :class="[
                      i <= storeLevel ? 'bg-warning' : 'bg-elevated',
                    ]"
                  />
                </div>
              </div>
              <div>å½“å‰ <span class="text-warning text-3xl font-bold">{{ storeLevel }}</span> çº§</div>

                    v-for="stat in storeStats"

                    :title="stat.title"

                  />
                </div>

          </div>

                <template #image>
                  <div class="p-2 bg-primary/10 rounded-full text-primary">
                    <div class="i-tabler:users size-6" />
                  </div>
                </template>
              </DuxMedia>

              <DuxMedia title="çƒ­é”€å•†å“" :desc="`ä»Šæ—¥çƒ­é”€ ${randomBetween(50, 200)} ä»¶å•†å“`">
                <template #image>
                  <div class="p-2 bg-info/10 rounded-full text-info">
                    <div class="i-tabler:flame size-6" />
                  </div>
                </template>
              </DuxMedia>

              <DuxMedia title="æ–°å¢ä¼šå‘˜" :desc="`ä»Šæ—¥æ–°å¢ ${randomBetween(20, 80)} ä½ä¼šå‘˜`">
                <template #image>
                  <div class="p-2 bg-warning/10 rounded-full text-warning">
                    <div class="i-tabler:user-plus size-6" />
                  </div>
                </template>
              </DuxMedia>

              <DuxMedia title="å¥½è¯„ç‡" :desc="`æœ¬æœˆå¥½è¯„ç‡ ${randomFloat(95, 99, 1)}%`">
                <template #image>
                  <div class="p-2 bg-success/10 rounded-full text-success">
                    <div class="i-tabler:thumb-up size-6" />
                  </div>

        <DuxStatsStore
          title="å®˜æ–¹è‡ªè¥æ——èˆ°åº—"
          avatar="https://picsum.photos/200/300"
          desc="ä¼˜è´¨å•†å“ï¼Œè¯šä¿¡ç»è¥"

        >
          <template #header>
            <div>åº—é“ºè¯„åˆ†</div>

              æè¿° <span class="text-default">{{ chartOptions.data[0].value[0] }}</span>

<script setup lang="ts">
import type { TableColumn } from '@duxweb/dvha-naiveui'
import type { UseActionItem } from '@duxweb/dvha-pro'
import { DuxTablePage, useAction, useDialog, useModal, useTableColumn } from '@duxweb/dvha-pro'
import { NInput } from 'naive-ui'
import { ref } from 'vue'

const filters = ref({
  keyword: '',
})

const { show } = useModal()

const { confirm } = useDialog()

function handleCreate() {
  // confirm({
  //   title: 'æ–°å¢',
  //   content: 'Are you sure you want to create?',
  // })

  show({
    title: 'æ–°å¢',
    component: () => import('./form/modal.vue'),
    draggable: true,
  })
}

const { renderTable, renderAction } = useAction()

const { renderMedia, renderSwitch, renderStatus, renderMap, renderInput, renderImage, renderCopy, renderHidden } = useTableColumn()

const columns: TableColumn[] = [
  {
    type: 'selection',
    key: 'selection',
    width: 50,
  },
  {
    title: 'ID',
    key: 'id',
    width: 100,
  },
  {
    title: 'æ˜µç§°',
    key: 'nickname',
    minWidth: 100,
    render: renderInput({
      key: 'nickname',
      tag: NInput,
    }),
  },
  {
    title: 'é‚®ç®±',
    key: 'email',
    minWidth: 200,
    render: renderCopy({
      key: 'email',
    }),
  },
  {
    title: 'ç”µè¯',
    key: 'phone',
    minWidth: 150,
    render: renderHidden({
      key: 'phone',
    }),
  },
  {
    title: 'ç”¨æˆ·',
    key: 'nickname',
    minWidth: 150,
    render: renderMedia({
      image: 'avatar',
      title: 'nickname',
      desc: 'email',
      avatar: true,
      imageWidth: 36,
      imageHeight: 36,
    }),
  },
  {
    title: 'è”ç³»',
    key: 'info',
    width: 300,
    render: renderMap({
      maps: [
        {
          key: 'email',
          label: 'é‚®ç®±',
          icon: 'i-tabler:mail',
        },
        {
          key: 'phone',
          label: 'æ‰‹æœº',
          icon: 'i-tabler:phone',
        },
      ],
    }),
  },
  {
    title: 'å›¾ç‰‡',
    key: 'images',
    minWidth: 100,
    render: renderImage({
      key: 'images',
    }),
  },
  {
    title: 'çŠ¶æ€',
    key: 'status',
    minWidth: 100,
    render: renderStatus({
      key: 'status',
      maps: {
        success: {
          label: 'æ­£å¸¸',
          value: true,
        },
        error: {
          label: 'ç¦ç”¨',
          value: false,
        },
      },
    }),
  },
  {
    title: 'çŠ¶æ€',
    key: 'status',
    minWidth: 100,
    render: renderSwitch({
      key: 'status',
    }),
  },
  {
    title: 'Action',
    key: 'actions',
    fixed: 'right',
    width: 130,
    align: 'center',
    render: renderTable({
      type: 'dropdown',
      text: true,
      align: 'center',
      items: [
        {
          label: 'ç¼–è¾‘',
          type: 'modal',
          component: () => import('./form/modal.vue'),
          draggable: true,
        },
        {
          label: 'åˆ é™¤',
          type: 'delete',
        },
      ],
    }),
  },
]

const tabs = ref([
  {
    label: 'å…¨éƒ¨',
    value: 'all',
  },
  {
    label: 'å·²å¯ç”¨',
    value: 'enabled',
  },
  {
    label: 'å·²ç¦ç”¨',
    value: 'disabled',
  },
])

const filterSchema = [
  {
    tag: NInput,
    attrs: {
      'placeholder': 'è¯·è¾“å…¥å…³é”®è¯æœç´¢',
      'v-model:value': [filters.value, 'keyword'],
    },
  },
]

const actions = ref<UseActionItem[]>([
  {
    label: 'æ–°å¢',
    type: 'modal',
    component: () => import('./form/modal.vue'),
    draggable: true,
  },
])
</script>

<template>
  <DuxTablePage
    path="user"
    :columns="columns"
    :filter="filters"
    :tabs="tabs"
    :filter-schema="filterSchema"
    :actions="actions"
    pagination
  />
</template>

import type { IConfig } from '@duxweb/dvha-core'
import { createDux, i18nProvider, simpleAuthProvider, simpleDataProvider } from '@duxweb/dvha-core'
import * as DuxNaiveUI from '@duxweb/dvha-naiveui'
import * as DuxPro from '@duxweb/dvha-pro'
import * as NaiveUI from 'naive-ui'
import { createApp } from 'vue'

// import '@duxweb/dvha-pro/style.css'

import '@duxweb/dvha-pro/theme/style.scss'

const { createDuxPro, DuxApp, DuxAuthLayout, DuxLayout, DuxLoginPage, DuxPage404, DuxPage500, enUS, zhCN } = DuxPro

const app = createApp(DuxApp)

const config: IConfig = {
  defaultManage: 'admin',
  manages: [
    {
      name: 'admin',
      title: 'Dvha Pro',
      routePrefix: '/admin',
      apiBasePath: '/admin',
      apiRoutePath: '/routes',
      components: {
        authLayout: DuxAuthLayout,
        noAuthLayout: DuxLayout,
        notFound: DuxPage404,
        error: DuxPage500,
      },
      userMenus: [
        {
          label: 'è®¾ç½®',
          key: 'setting',
          icon: 'i-tabler:settings',
          path: 'setting',
        },
      ],
      routes: [
        {
          name: 'admin.login',
          path: 'login',
          component: DuxLoginPage,
          meta: {
            authorization: false,
          },
        },
      ],
      menus: [
        {
          name: 'home',
          path: 'index',
          icon: 'i-tabler:home',
          label: 'å·¥ä½œå°',
          component: () => import('./pages/home.vue'),
        },
        {
          name: 'stats',
          path: 'stats',
          icon: 'i-tabler:chart-bar',
          label: 'ç»Ÿè®¡',
          component: () => import('./pages/stats.vue'),
        },

        {
          name: 'example.list',
          icon: 'i-tabler:layout-kanban',
          label: 'åˆ—è¡¨ ',
        },
        {
          name: 'table',
          path: 'table',
          icon: 'i-tabler:table',
          label: 'è¡¨æ ¼åˆ—è¡¨',
          component: () => import('./pages/table.vue'),
          parent: 'example.list',
        },
        {
          name: 'list.card',
          path: 'list/card',
          icon: 'i-tabler:list-check',
          label: 'å¡ç‰‡åˆ—è¡¨',
          parent: 'example.list',
          component: () => import('./pages/list/card.vue'),
        },
        {
          name: 'list.article',
          path: 'list/article',
          icon: 'i-tabler:article',
          label: 'æ–‡ç« åˆ—è¡¨',
          parent: 'example.list',
          component: () => import('./pages/list/article.vue'),
        },
        {
          name: 'list.list',
          path: 'list/list',
          icon: 'i-tabler:list',
          label: 'è®¢å•åˆ—è¡¨',
          parent: 'example.list',
          component: () => import('./pages/list/list.vue'),
        },
        {
          name: 'example.form',
          icon: 'i-tabler:layout-kanban',
          label: 'è¡¨å•',
        },
        {
          name: 'form.ui',
          path: 'form/ui',
          icon: 'i-tabler:forms',
          label: 'åŸºæœ¬ç»„ä»¶',
          component: () => import('./pages/form/ui.vue'),
          parent: 'example.form',
        },
        {
          name: 'form.form',
          path: 'form/form',
          icon: 'i-tabler:forms',
          label: 'é«˜é˜¶ç»„ä»¶',
          component: () => import('./pages/form/page.vue'),
          parent: 'example.form',
        },
        {
          name: 'form.setting',
          path: 'form/setting',
          icon: 'i-tabler:settings',
          label: 'è®¾ç½®é¡µé¢',
          hidden: false,
          component: () => import('./pages/setting.vue'),
          parent: 'example.form',
        },
        {
          name: 'interaction',
          path: 'interaction',
          icon: 'i-tabler:chart-bar',
          label: 'äº¤äº’',
          component: () => import('./pages/interaction.vue'),
        },
        {
          name: 'chart',
          path: 'chart',
          icon: 'i-tabler:chart-bar',
          label: 'å›¾è¡¨',
          component: () => import('./pages/chart.vue'),
        },
        {
          name: 'render',
          icon: 'i-tabler:layout-kanban',
          label: 'æ¸²æŸ“',
        },
        {
          name: 'render.json',
          path: 'render/json',
          label: 'Jsonæ¸²æŸ“',
          parent: 'render',
          icon: 'i-tabler:json',
          component: () => import('./pages/render.vue'),
        },
        {
          name: 'render.remote',
          path: 'render/remote',
          icon: 'i-tabler:list-check',
          label: 'è¿œç¨‹æ¸²æŸ“',
          loader: 'remote',
          parent: 'render',
          meta: {
            path: '/remote',
          },

        },
        {
          name: 'poster',
          path: 'poster',
          icon: 'i-tabler:photo',
          label: 'å›¾åƒ',
          component: () => import('./pages/posterEditor.vue'),
        },
        {
          name: 'design',
          path: 'design',
          icon: 'i-tabler:code',
          label: 'è®¾è®¡',
          component: () => import('./pages/designEditor.vue'),
        },
      ],
    },
  ],
  dataProvider: simpleDataProvider({
    apiUrl: 'https://m1.apifoxmock.com/m1/4407506-4052338-default',
  }),
  authProvider: simpleAuthProvider(),
  i18nProvider: i18nProvider({
    locale: 'zh-CN',
    fallbackLocale: 'en-US',
    messages: {
      'zh-CN': zhCN,
      'en-US': enUS,
    },
  }),
  remote: {
    packages: {
      'naive-ui': NaiveUI,
      '@duxweb/dvha-pro': DuxPro,
    },
  },
  jsonSchema: {
    components: [
      ...Object.values(DuxPro).filter(comp => comp?.name?.startsWith?.('Dux')),
      ...Object.values(DuxNaiveUI).filter(comp => comp?.name?.startsWith?.('Dux')),
      ...Object.entries(NaiveUI)
        .filter(([key, _comp]) => {
          return key.startsWith?.('N')
        })
        .map((comp) => {
          const component = comp[1] as any
          component.name = comp[0]
          return component
        }),
    ],
  },
}

app.use(createDux(config))

app.use(NaiveUI)
app.use(createDuxPro())

app.mount('#app')

import { resolve } from 'node:path'
import vue from '@vitejs/plugin-vue'
import VueJsx from '@vitejs/plugin-vue-jsx'
import { defineConfig } from 'vite'

export default defineConfig(({ mode }) => ({
  base: mode === 'production' ? '/dvha/start/' : '/',
  plugins: [
    vue(),
    VueJsx(),
  ],
  resolve: {
    alias: {
      '@duxweb/dvha-core': resolve(__dirname, '../../packages/core/src'),
      '@duxweb/dvha-naiveui': resolve(__dirname, '../../packages/naiveui/src'),
      '@duxweb/dvha-elementui': resolve(__dirname, '../../packages/elementui/src'),
      '@duxweb/dvha-pro': resolve(__dirname, '../../packages/pro/src'),
    },
  },
  output: {
    manualChunks: {
      'vendor-vue': ['vue', 'vue-router'],
      'vendor-naive': ['naive-ui'],
      'vendor-echarts': ['echarts', 'vue-echarts'],
      'vendor-vueuse': ['@vueuse/core'],
      'vendor-pinia': ['pinia', 'pinia-plugin-persistedstate'],
      'vendor-loader': ['vue3-sfc-loader'],
      'vendor-lodash': ['lodash-es', 'lodash'],
      'vendor-icon': ['@iconify-json/tabler'],
    },
  },
  build: {
    rollupOptions: {
      input: {
        index: resolve(__dirname, 'index.html'),
      },
      output: {
      },
    },
    outDir: resolve(__dirname, 'dist'),
  },
}))

File: /packages/core/src/components/auth/can.tsx
---

import type { PropType } from 'vue'
import { defineComponent } from 'vue'
import { useCan } from '../../hooks'

export const DuxCan = defineComponent({
  name: 'DuxCan',
  props: {
    name: { type: String, required: true },
    params: { type: Object as PropType<any> },
  },
  setup(props, { slots }) {
    const can = useCan()
    return () => can(props.name, props.params) ? slots.default?.() : (slots.fallback?.() || null)
  },
})

---
File: /packages/core/src/components/loader/remote/index.ts
---

export * from './loader'
export * from './render'



---
File: /packages/core/src/components/loader/remote/loader.tsx
---

import type { Options, Resource } from 'vue3-sfc-loader'
import * as vueQuery from '@tanstack/vue-query'
import * as vueUse from '@vueuse/core'
import axios from 'axios'
import crypto from 'crypto-js'
import dayjs from 'dayjs'
import * as _ from 'lodash-es'
import * as math from 'mathjs'
import mime from 'mime'
import mitt from 'mitt'
import * as pinia from 'pinia'
import * as Vue from 'vue'
import { loadModule } from 'vue3-sfc-loader'
import * as vueRouter from 'vue-router'
import { useManage } from '../../../hooks'
import * as index from '../../../index'

const styleCache = new Map<string, boolean>()

function hashString(str: string): string {
  return crypto.MD5(str).toString().substring(0, 10)
}

export function sfcLoader(path: string) {
  const client = index.useClient()

  const { mergeLocale } = index.useI18n()

  const { config } = useManage()

  const options: Options = {
    moduleCache: {
      'vue': Vue,
      '@duxweb/dvha-core': index,
      '@vueuse/core': vueUse,
      '@tanstack/vue-query': vueQuery,
      'axios': axios,
      'crypto': crypto,
      'mime': mime,
      'math': math,
      'mitt': mitt,
      'lodash-es': _,
      'pinia': pinia,
      'dayjs': dayjs,
      'vue-router': vueRouter,
      ...config?.remote?.packages,

      'static!': function (content: string, _path: string, type: string) {
        const name = mime.getType(type)
        if (name?.startsWith('image')) {
          return `data:${name};charset=utf-8;base64,${btoa(content)}`
        }
        if (type === '.json') {
          return JSON.parse(content)
        }
        throw new Error(`${type} unable to parse`)
      },
    },
    async handleModule(type: string, getContentData: () => any) {
      if (type === '.vue') {
        return undefined
      }
      if (type === '.json') {
        const contentData = await getContentData()

        const { render: JsonRender } = index.useJsonSchema({
          data: contentData?.nodes || {},
          context: contentData?.data || {},
        })

        return () => <JsonRender />
      }
      if (type === '.mjs') {
        return undefined
      }
      return getContentData()
    },
    customBlockHandler(block) {
      if (block.type === 'i18n') {
        const messages = JSON.parse(block.content)
        for (const locale in messages) {
          mergeLocale(locale, messages[locale])
        }
      }
    },
    getFile: async (url) => {
      url = removeSuffix(url, '.vue')
      url = removeSuffix(url, '.json')

      const res = await client.request({
        path: typeof config?.remote?.apiRoutePath === 'function' ? config?.remote?.apiRoutePath(url) : config?.remote?.apiRoutePath || `static`,
        payload: {
          path: url,
        },
        method: config?.remote?.apiMethod || 'POST',
      }).then((res) => {
        return res?.data
      }).catch((err) => {
        throw new Error(`${err?.message} ${url}`)
      })

      let fileType = res?.type || '.vue'

      if (res?.type?.endsWith('js') || res?.type?.endsWith('ts') || res?.type?.endsWith('jsx') || res?.type?.endsWith('tsx')) {
        fileType = '.mjs'
      }

      return {
        content: res?.content,
        type: fileType,
      }
    },
    getResource({ refPath, relPath }, options: Options): Resource {
      const { moduleCache, pathResolve, getFile } = options

      const [resourceRelPath, ...loaders] = relPath.match(/([^!]+!)|[^!]+$/g).reverse()

      const processContentThroughLoaders = (content, path, type, options) => {
        return loaders.reduce((content, loader) => {
          return moduleCache[loader](content, path, type, options)
        }, content)
      }

      const path = pathResolve({ refPath, relPath: resourceRelPath }, options)
      const id = loaders.join('') + path

      const isPackage = (p: string) => {
        if (p.startsWith('@'))
          return true
        return !p.includes('/') && !p.startsWith('.')
      }

      return {
        id,
        path,
        async getContent() {
          if (isPackage(path)) {
            throw new Error(`Package ${path} not imported`)
          }

          const { content, type } = await getFile(path)

          return {
            getContentData: async (_asBinary: boolean) => processContentThroughLoaders(content, path, type, options),
            type,
          }
        },
      }
    },
    addStyle(textContent) {
      const hash = hashString(textContent)

      if (styleCache.has(hash)) {
        return
      }

      styleCache.set(hash, true)

      const style = document.createElement('style')
      style.textContent = textContent
      style.setAttribute('data-hash', hash)

      document.head.appendChild(style)
    },
  }

  return () => loadModule(`${path}`, { ...options })
}

function removeSuffix(url: string, suffix: string) {
  const regex = new RegExp(`${suffix}$`)
  return url.replace(regex, '')
}



---
File: /packages/core/src/components/loader/remote/render.tsx
---

import { defineAsyncComponent, defineComponent } from 'vue'
import { useRoute } from 'vue-router'
import { useRouteStore } from '../../../stores'
import { sfcLoader } from './loader'

export const DuxRemoteRender = defineComponent({
  name: 'DuxRemoteRender',
  setup(_props) {
    const route = useRoute()
    const routeStore = useRouteStore()
    const info = routeStore.searchRouteName(route.name as string)

    const AsyncComp = defineAsyncComponent({
      loader: sfcLoader(info?.meta?.path),
    })

    return () => <AsyncComp />
  },
})

import { defineComponent } from 'vue'
import { useRoute } from 'vue-router'

export default defineComponent({
  name: 'DuxLoaderIframe',
  setup(_props) {
    const route = useRoute()
    return () => (
      <iframe src={route.meta?.url as string} style={{ width: '100%', height: '100%', border: 'none' }}></iframe>
    )
  },
})

---
File: /packages/core/src/components/overlay/overlay.tsx
---

import { useExtendOverlay } from '@overlastic/vue'
import { defineAsyncComponent, defineComponent, Transition } from 'vue'

export const DuxOverlay = defineComponent({
  name: 'DuxOverlay',
  props: {
    component: Function,
    componentProps: Object,
    mask: {
      type: Boolean,
      default: true,
    },
    maskClosable: {
      type: Boolean,
      default: true,
    },
    duration: {
      type: Number,
      default: 300,
    },
    zIndex: {
      type: Number,
      default: 1000,
    },
  },
  setup(props) {
    const { visible, resolve, reject } = useExtendOverlay({
      duration: props.duration,
    })

    const params = props?.componentProps || {}
    params.onConfirm = resolve
    params.onClose = reject

    const Modal = defineAsyncComponent(props.component as () => Promise<any>)

    const handleMaskClick = () => {
      if (props.maskClosable) {
        reject()
      }
    }
    return () => (
      <div
        class="fixed inset-0 flex items-center justify-center overflow-auto"
        style={{
          zIndex: props.zIndex,
        }}
      >
        <Transition
          enterActiveClass="transition-opacity"
          enterFromClass="opacity-0"
          enterToClass="opacity-100"
          leaveActiveClass="transition-opacity"
          leaveFromClass="opacity-100"
          leaveToClass="opacity-0"
        >
          {visible.value && props.mask && (
            <div
              class="fixed inset-0 bg-black bg-opacity-30"
              style={{
                transitionDuration: `${props.duration}ms`,
              }}
              onClick={handleMaskClick}
            >
            </div>
          )}
        </Transition>

        <Transition
          enterActiveClass="transition-all"
          enterFromClass="opacity-0 scale-95"
          enterToClass="opacity-100 scale-100"
          leaveActiveClass="transition-all"
          leaveFromClass="opacity-100 scale-100"
          leaveToClass="opacity-0 scale-95"
        >
          {visible.value && (
            <Modal {...params} />
          )}
        </Transition>
      </div>
    )
  },
})

  name: 'DuxError',

---
File: /packages/core/src/components/status/exception.tsx
---

import { defineComponent, onErrorCaptured, ref } from 'vue'
import { useRoute } from 'vue-router'

export const DuxException = defineComponent({
  name: 'DuxException',
  setup(_props, { slots }) {
    const data = ref<Record<string, any> | null>(null)
    const route = useRoute()

    onErrorCaptured((err) => {
      console.error(err)
      if (!route.name) {
        data.value = {
          title: '404',
          desc: 'Page not found',
        }
      }
      else {
        data.value = {
          title: '500',
          desc: err?.message || 'Internal Server Error',
        }
      }
      return false
    })

    return () => data.value
      ? (
          <div>
            <h1>{data.value?.title || 'Unknown'}</h1>
            <p>{data.value?.desc || 'Unknown Description'}</p>
            <p>Use config.components.exception to configure the exception layout</p>
          </div>
        )
      : slots.default?.()
  },
})
